issue.title: Gazebo crashes when spawning model after upgrading sdformat from 1.4.6-1 to 1.4.7-1

content.raw:
gazebo_1.9.1-2 was not a re-tag, it was a rebuild of the gazebo_1.9.1 tag against the updated sdformat 1.4.7.

I think gazebo 2.0.0's issues will be a separate issue from this. If [gazebo issue 888](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/888/gezbo-in-apt-repositories-is-not) is relevant, it might be easier to move this discussion there.
content.html:

I think gazebo 2.0.0's issues will be a separate issue from this. If gazebo issue 888 is relevant, it might be easier to move this discussion there.
